root.name: The Sims 3: Generations
root.description: OverviewThe Sims 3: Generations Expansion Pack is focused around your sim's life and memories. New features include new activities your sims can participate in, like treehouses for children, huge parties for teens and midlife crises for adults which allows the player to change their sim's life goals. The game also includes new celebrations like high school graduation parties, official wedding ceremonies and all out house parties while the parents aren't home! Sims can also learn new skills in Generations including: home movie making, playing with chemistry sets and dress up as an astronaut, princess or a dinosaur. The player can also share their sims's memories on Facebook or on their page of Thesims.com.System RequirementsPC System Requirements:Windows XP SP2, / Vista SP1/ Windows 7CPU: XP 2.0 GHz P4 processor or equivalent / Vista and Windows 7 2.4 GHzMemory: XP 1 GB RAM / 2 GB RAM for Vista and Windows 7HDD: 2.5 GB of hard drive space with at least 1 GB of additional space for custom content and saved gamesVideo: 128 MB Video Card with Pixel Shader 2.0 support
